movie.title: Batman: Death in the Family
movie.description_intro: In this very first interactive animated DC movie, you get to decide Jason Todd's fate. Will Jason Todd live or die? What will become of Batman and the Joker? Will there truly be a death in the Bat-Family? The answer will be in your hands. Choose wisely.
movie.description_full: In this very first interactive animated DC movie, you get to decide Jason Todd's fate. Will Jason Todd live or die? What will become of Batman and the Joker? Will there truly be a death in the Bat-Family? The answer will be in your hands. Choose wisely.

movies.title: Ninja bugeicho momochi sandayu
movies.summary: In the middle of the 16th century, Hideyoshi, a power hungry warlord sets out to destroy the Momochi clan. He sends his war commander in search of the clan's hidden gold only to find that two daggers are the key to the hiding place of the treasured gold. Spanning decades, the quest for the missing daggers takes Shiranui through war and ancient tradition.

Spanning decades, the quest for the missing daggers takes Shiranui through war and ancient tradition.

movies.title: Perfect Cowboy
movies.summary: A community-based, alternative family film about two gay fathers of a straight country western singer, all living in a rural community and playing music together. Jimmy Poole gets out of prison and kicks his stepson Mark out of the family's band.
movies.description_full: A community-based, alternative family film about two gay fathers of a straight country western singer, all living in a rural community and playing music together. Jimmy Poole gets out of prison and kicks his stepson Mark out of the family's band.

movies.title: Death Duel
movies.summary: The Third Master (Erh Tung Sheng, aka Derek Yee, in the role that launched his career) is considered to be the greatest sword master of the day. His displays of skill and strength bring armies of challengers to his door, seeking the title for themselves. Not to be defeated, the Third Master fights evil, saves damsels in distress, and duels rival swordsmen to the death.

movies.title: Stained
movies.summary: A terrifying, modern adaptation of Shakespeare's Macbeth set in Scotland, CA. Scorning the mediocrity of their mundane lives, John and Jane Macbeth carry out a horrific plan to make the American dream a reality.
movies.description_full: A terrifying, modern adaptation of Shakespeare's Macbeth set in Scotland, CA. Scorning the mediocrity of their mundane lives, John and Jane Macbeth carry out a horrific plan to make the American dream a reality.
